on reading compounds: 放る【ホウル】to throw, to fling, to hurl, to toss, to neglect, to abandon, to leave alone, to give up on, to leave undone, to leave unfinished
放棄【ホウキ】abandonment, renunciation, resignation, abdication (responsibility, right)
kun reading compounds: 投げ打つ【なげうつ】to abandon, to throw away, to fling away
